text: This idea has been out there for quite a while but we need more people to help by upvoting it.  The idea is that we need our customers to be able to update all fields in line items from a single grid instead of having to update some of the fields one-at-a-time.  If you agree please upvote.  Thanks.  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Active-line-items-using-single-line-text/idc-p/957390#M175926>
